subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Ben Curtis moved closer to his first title since the 2003 British Open, shooting a four-under-par 67 yesterday to take a five-stroke lead after three rounds at the Booz Allen Classic in Potomac, Md. He was at 19-under 213, breaking the tournament record through 54 holes at the T.P.C. at Avenel.
